footer.happyToTalk: We're happy to talk with you

opening.subtitle1: Meet your new native software partner.

avoidMistakes.title: The Left Bit's partners avoid expensive mistakes

makeBusiness.makeYourBusiness: Make your business idea a reality with us
makeBusiness.weWillHelp: We will help build a robust & functional product ready to market

weDontWant.titleFirst: We don't want clients, we want

weThink.message1: We help you focus your digital product towards your business objectives and user needs
weThink.message2: We build robust, lightweight, and maintainable software so you can continue working with it after an MVP
weThink.message3: We partner with companies to gain a deep understanding of their business and continually improve the product

method.title: Our Method
method.description: We concentrate our efforts in offering value as soon as possible. We believe in a lean strategy to grow through fast iteration based in real data.

tech.title: Our tech stack
tech.description: We adapt our technology to our partner’s needs, not the other way around. We take in consideration budget, long-term implications and project needs to offer exactly what our clients need.

team.unparalleledProfessionals: We only work with unparalleled professionals that have a holistic point of view when it comes to building software.
team.careAboutBusinessTechDesign: We all care about business, tech and design.
team.alwaysHappyWorking: We’re always happy to working with pro stars in the industry. If you feel you fit our culture, please leave us a line and let’s talk :)
